name: PRE_AR_SESSION
description: This table stores single response items for charges. Note: temporary accounts receivable (TAR) records in Chronicles are purged periodically depending on your system setting. Be aware that old data in this table might be lost if you truncate the table.

columns.name: TAR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the temporary transaction.

columns.name: TX_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The source of the charge session.

columns.name: LK_IN_PCONC_VAL
columns.description: Concurrency Value locked in anesthesia charge summary.

columns.name: LK_IN_PCONC_USR_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user who locked-in preconcurrency in anesthesia charge summary.

columns.name: LK_IN_PCONC_IN_DTTM
columns.description: The timestamp when preconcurrency was locked in anesthesia charge summary.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The treatment plan on the charge session.

columns.name: ANES_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type category for the temporary�anesthesia transaction.

columns.name: EMERG_STAT_YN
columns.description: Indicates where this charge is associated with an admitted�patient with an emergency status.

columns.name: PHYSICAL_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: Physical status of the patient who had the anesthesia procedure.

columns.name: SUP_MOD_OVRIDE_YN
columns.description: Override the normal modifier with the modifier corresponding to a medically supervised case.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_CRNA_TX
columns.description: Original CRNA transaction ID.

columns.name: POS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The place of service type category ID for the temporary transaction.
entries: Intermediate Care Facility/ Individuals with Intellectual Disabilities
Telehealth - Provided Other than in Patient's Home

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the guarantor account on the charge session.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient on the charge session.

columns.name: PERF_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the performing provider on the charge session.

columns.name: BILL_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the billing provider on the charge session.

columns.name: REFERRING_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral provider on the charge session.

columns.name: REFERRING_PROV_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM
columns.description: The name of the referral source.

columns.name: DEPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department on the charge session.

columns.name: POS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the place of service on the charge session.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the service area on the charge session.

columns.name: LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location on the charge session.

columns.name: TX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Tells what this transaction record is used for (e.g. charge, payment, adjustment, etc...).

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This column contains the patient encounter serial number for the charge session.

columns.name: RQG_ID
columns.description: This column contains the reference lab requisition grouper ID.

columns.name: ANES_SUP_UNIT_PROC_TOT_UNIT
columns.description: The total number of units of supplemental unit procedures for this charge session.

columns.name: CHARGE_SLIP_NUMBER
columns.description: This is the number used to associate PB charge sessions with encounters.

columns.name: DENTAL_CHARGE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates what type of dental charge it is.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_PAYER_ID
columns.description: The payer that overrides the payer on a charge session. If this item is set, the system uses this payer instead of the payer from the coverage on the charge session. If this item is left blank, the payer from the coverage on the charge session is used.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_PAYER_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The plan that overrides the plan on a charge session. If this item is set, the system uses this plan instead of the plan from the coverage on the charge session. If this item is left blank, the plan from the coverage on the charge session is used.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_HTR_ID
columns.description: The original hospital billing transaction ID.

columns.name: CODED_DATE
columns.description: Coded date for charge session.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The lab specimen ID associated with the temporary charge session.

columns.name: TEST_ID
columns.description: The test ID associated with the temporary charge session.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral number for the referral associated to this charge.

columns.name: REQUISITION_ID
columns.description: Reference Lab Requisition ID associated with the temporary charge session.
